Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.53663446 0.12182189 0.70240081 0.16292733 0.05931447 0.90050243
#>  [7] 0.47620493 0.28946887 0.33910040 0.60423609 0.76876470 0.58122640
#> [13] 0.03871923 0.86899732 0.34395657 0.98711053 0.78283491 0.48182823
#> [19] 0.41771542 0.32596427
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.02512917 0.93839131 0.81138622 0.48336636 0.55540239 0.98751136
#>  [7] 0.24306424 0.94912684 0.59937987 0.91101043 0.21396198 0.54245008
#> [13] 0.80340975 0.79730529 0.16436275 0.77168616 0.76843586 0.69441317
#> [19] 0.13851769 0.01265775

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.25403812 0.96462437 0.40916755 0.95726390 0.09855260 0.37225467
#>  [7] 0.31265928 0.05717046 0.22416959 0.09398864
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.2676233 0.5919041 0.7668764 0.1699583 0.3691641 0.3455682 0.7312430
#>  [8] 0.3461454 0.7533176 0.5486953
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.809250298 0.692912607 0.005513152 0.363298330 0.032022483 0.311821683
#>  [7] 0.232122970 0.155257325 0.640074814 0.127119008

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.4535274 0.1804904 0.8578117 0.7543464 0.9509868
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.39543331 0.03127549 0.55837725 0.45345834 0.77737048
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.4254127 0.2944540 0.1386006 0.4944455 0.7194900
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.42952426 0.53061071 0.11149213 0.02576629 0.57739291

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.7459878 0.5319300 0.1581221 0.5006427 0.6459895
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.6036816 0.4692090 0.6280018 0.4277575 0.4407697
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.9058262 0.8310813 0.8072555 0.7330877 0.3808348
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.83298791 0.56229219 0.04351315 0.38284600 0.15542828

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.1413167 0.3797188 0.1375599 0.5987208 0.7011583
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.3213106 0.7597392 0.1717590 0.8695963 0.6688461
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.218234006 0.961182781 0.425837820 0.552821759 0.009687192
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.9856402 0.5503554 0.1766835 0.5289694 0.5951165

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          7.9         3.8          6.4         2.0  virginica
#> 2          5.5         2.4          3.7         1.0 versicolor
#> 3          5.1         3.8          1.9         0.4     setosa
#> 4          6.5         2.8          4.6         1.5 versicolor
#> 5          5.1         2.5          3.0         1.1 versicolor
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          7.7         2.6          6.9         2.3  virginica
#> 2          5.1         3.7          1.5         0.4     setosa
#> 3          6.2         2.2          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 4          6.0         2.9          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 5          6.7         3.3          5.7         2.5  virginica
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.4         3.2          5.3         2.3  virginica
#> 2          5.5         2.4          3.8         1.1 versicolor
#> 3          5.6         2.5          3.9         1.1 versicolor
#> 4          5.8         2.7          4.1         1.0 versicolor
#> 5          5.7         2.6          3.5         1.0 versicolor

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           5.7         4.4
#> 2           5.0         3.5
#> 3           5.6         2.5
#> 4           5.4         3.4
#> 5           6.1         2.8
#> 6           7.7         2.6
#> 7           5.7         3.8
#> 8           6.9         3.1
#> 9           4.3         3.0
#> 10          4.6         3.4
#> 11          4.8         3.4
#> 12          5.5         3.5
#> 13          6.1         2.9
#> 14          6.0         2.2
#> 15          6.9         3.1
#> 16          7.2         3.6
#> 17          4.7         3.2
#> 18          5.1         3.8
#> 19          5.1         3.3
#> 20          6.5         3.2

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          7.6         3.0
#> 2          7.3         2.9
#> 3          5.5         2.5
#> 4          5.0         3.3
#> 5          6.0         3.4
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.4         3.1
#> 2          4.9         2.4
#> 3          6.8         2.8
#> 4          6.2         2.8
#> 5          6.7         3.3
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.0         2.2
#> 2          6.9         3.2
#> 3          7.1         3.0
#> 4          5.7         2.5
#> 5          6.7         3.0
